page.title: 11Hadlow Castle
page.content: A prominent landmark in our area is the 170 foot high tower of Hadlow Castle.The castle and grounds are privately owned and are not open to the general public. We were kindly given permission to look around the grounds. We entered through the churchyard and went through an archway to the courtyard.The buildings round the courtyard consist of the coachouse, stables,servant's quarters, the domestic buildings of the castle and the tower.Except for a few small windows which have recently been added,all the buildings retain their original outward appearance, though they have been changed inside to make six separate houses.The rest of the castle was demolished in 1951. The tower has recently been offered for sale at Â£120,000 but wasn't sold.
